ctu_text: \n\n", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme \u201cSanitary Napkin Scheme\u201d is implemented by the Uttarakhand Building and Other Construction Workers\u2019 Welfare Board (UKBOCWWB), Labour Department, Government of Uttarakhand. Under the scheme, sanitary napkins will be provided to the daughters of registered construction workers and women construction workers, subject to the conditions specified by the Board. The beneficiary should not be receiving the same benefits under any other scheme of the central or state Governments, and should not have applied in any other department for the same benefits.
